fillers.title: Scroll Whispers
text: The MazeScroll rustles, its ink rearranging to warn of unseen claws.
A margin note forms: 'Minor scrape interpreted as heroic flourish.'

interpretation.scrollNarrative: The hero gains a cosmetic tail of inked smoke.

fillers.title: Temporary Tail
text: A playful glyph sprouts from the hero's shadow, swishing like a cat's tail.
It fades with the next decisive strike, leaving only amused annotations.

interpretation.scrollNarrative: Status effects are visualized as quirky appendages.

fillers.title: Margin Sketch
text: Illustrations bloom along the parchment: future rooms, half-sketched foes.
The hero can linger to study them, gaining hints or simply inspiration.

fillers.title: Candy Smudge
text: A smear of candied ink stains the edge of the scroll, buzzing faintly.
Touching it summons a tiny candy gremlin doodle that offers a trade.

fillers.title: Bone Echo
text: The scroll flutters, replaying the clash with skeletal foes as animated etchings.
Each impact is recorded as a musical note, charting the hero's resilience.
